response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the chance to secure this product at a special price of $1,350,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value and provides you with an unparalleled advantage. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your endeavors. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1350000}
